definition: old fogy/adherent of previous dynasty
to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: The old man is a survival of the past age.
sentences.chinese: 這老人乃上一個期間的遺老。

sentences.english: The old man was a survival of a past age.
sentences.chinese: 這位老人是上一代的遺老。

sentences.english: More than one hundred old fogies migrated to Qingdao occupied by Genmany after the Qing Dynasty's abdication.
sentences.chinese: 清廷遜位後，一百多名遺老客居德人佔據的青島。

sentences.english: Besides, who on earth is the old adherent?
sentences.chinese: 還有那個“遺老”指的究竟是誰？

definition: to forfeit sovereignty and humiliate the country (idiom)/to surrender territory under humiliating terms
Self-Strengthening Movement (period of reforms in China c 1861-1894), also named 自強運動|自强运动
Huanghuagang (Chrysanthemum Hill) in Guangzhou, scene of disastrous uprising of 23rd April 1911
(old) to instruct the young/to teach a child to read and write/as easy as ABC
to be confused/to be at a loss/Taiwan pr. [fa1 meng2]
Zhang Juzheng (1525-1582), Grand Secretary during the Ming dynasty, credited with bringing the dynasty to its apogee
the hardships of beginning an undertaking (idiom)
governor general 总督 and inspector general 巡抚
the New Culture Movement (mid-1910s and 1920s), intellectual revolution against Confucianism aiming to introduce Western elements, especially democracy and science
Chen Duxiu (1879-1942), co-founder of the Chinese Communist Party in 1921
to sacrifice one's life
comprador
letter/also written 書札|书札
to write a book advancing one's theory (idiom)
to recover one's power or authority/restoration (of a past regime)
the Northern Warlords (1912-1927)
May Fourth Movement/Chinese national renewal movement that started with 4th May 1919 protest against the Treaty of Versailles
